law_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY ORDINANCE

sections.body: (1) This Ordinance may be called the Small and Medium Enterprises Development Authority Ordinance 2002. (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan. (3) It shall come into force at once.

In this Ordinance, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context, various definitions are provided for terms such as 'Authority', 'Board', 'Chairman', 'Chief Executive Officer', 'Committee', 'employee', 'Executive Secretary', 'Federal Government', 'Fund', 'Member', 'Person', 'prescribed', 'private sector', 'regulations', 'rules', and 'S.M.E.s'.

(1) There shall be established an Authority to be called the Small and Medium Enterprises Development Authority for carrying out the purposes and objectives of this Ordinance. (2) The Authority shall be a body corporate having perpetual succession and a common seal, with power, subject to the provisions of this Ordinance, to acquire, take-over, hold and dispose of property, both moveable and immovable, to inter into contracts and shall by the said name sue and be sued.

sections.section_title: Powers and functions of the Authority.
sections.body: (1) The Authority shall have all such powers as may be necessary to perform its duties and functions under this Ordinance. (2) The Authority shall exercise and perform various powers and functions including facilitating policy-making, conducting research, advising the Federal Government, and providing support services for S.M.E.s.

sections.section_title: Exercise of the powers and functions of the Authority to be vested in a Board.
sections.body: The powers and functions of the Authority and the general and overall direction, management, control and superintendence of the affairs of the Authority shall vest in a Board.

(1) The Board shall consist of the Chairman, various Secretaries from the Government of Pakistan, the Chief Executive Officer, and six persons from the private sector. (2) The Members mentioned in clauses (b) to (e) shall be ex officio Members.
